headline.main: There Is No Economic Case for Breaking Up the United Kingdom, Says May
headline.print_headline: There Is No Economic Case for Breaking Up the United Kingdom, Says May

lead_paragraph: Tens of millions of dollars in royalties and signing bonuses that Glencore told an independent transparency board it had paid to Congo's state mining company actually went to a business controlled by Israeli billionaire Dan Gertler, advocacy group Global Witness said in a report on Friday.
